title: Attribution Window
description: Describes the attribution methodology and lookback windows used for conversion measurement. Enables cross-platform comparison by making attribution methodology transparent.

click_window_days.description: Click-through attribution window in days. Conversions occurring within this many days after a click are attributed to the ad.

view_window_days.description: View-through attribution window in days. Conversions occurring within this many days after an ad impression (without click) are attributed to the ad.

model.description: Attribution model used to assign credit when multiple touchpoints exist
